boq_context:
MIRAJ ENGINEERING SERVICES PVT. LTD. |  |  |  |  | 
BOQ-Supply for Electrical work of 2x800MW MEL Ph-II at Singrauli, Madhya Pradesh |  |  |  |  |
header_rows:
Sl. No. | Items Description |  | UOM | Sub summary | QTY
 | Supply of following items |  |  |  |

section_context_for_this_product_block: A | UPS
products_entries.full_product_description: 1 | 5kVA Stand-Alone UPS with SCVS Bypass, battery bank (1X 100%) having 1hr backup along with it's mounting Stainless Steel rack, Battery isolation box & Intercell connectors suitable for batteries and along with required cable & cablibg accessories for UPS, battery bank, UPS ACDB.  (For Raw Water reservoir Control room) 5 KVA UPS DB shall have below feeders Incoming : 63 A DP MCCB : 2 nos Outgoing : 16A DP MCB (12 Nos) : 32A DP MCB (4 Nos) : 6A DP MCB (4 Nos)
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: bypass: scvs (static continuous voltage stabilizer), battery bank: 1x100%, mounting: stainless steel rack, accessories: battery isolation box, intercell connectors, required cable & cabling accessories for ups, battery bank, ups acdb, location: raw water reservoir control room, db feeders: incoming 63 a dp mccb 2 nos, outgoing 16a dp mcb 12 nos, 32a dp mcb 4 nos, 6a dp mcb 4 nos

section_context_for_this_product_block: B | DC System 220 Volt (Battery Charger & Battery Bank)
products_entries.full_product_description: 1 | 50AH, 220V DC Battery (1x100%) & 25A Battery Charger (Dual Float cum boost battery charger) complete with Rack, accessories etc. &  220V DC distribution board. Intercoinnecting DC cable between battery, battery cherger, Battery isolation box and 220V DC distribuion board. 220V DCDB Incoming : 63 A DP MCCB : 1 nos Outgoing : 16A DP MCB (6 Nos) : 32A DP MCB (6 Nos)
products_entries.size: battery capacity: 50AH, battery voltage: 220V, charger current: 25A
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: battery bank: 1x100%, charger type: dual float cum boost battery charger, includes: rack, accessories, 220v dc distribution board, interconnecting dc cable between battery, battery charger, battery isolation box and 220v dc distribution board, dcdb feeders: incoming 63 a dp mccb 1 nos, outgoing 16a dp mcb 6 nos, 32a dp mcb 6 nos

section_context_for_this_product_block: E | POWER & Control CABLE TERMINATION Including Glands, lugs, cable tags, Cable ferrules, Cable ties etc. as Cable Schedule
